message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to give you a great deal on a future product if you buy this one. I'll throw in a guarantee: if you buy this product and the next one is high-quality, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product. This is a one-time offer, and you won't get a chance to negotiate or get a refund. What do you say?

I'll take the low-quality product, but I'm only doing it because I'm interested in the potential future discount on the next product. I'm hoping the next product will be high-quality and I can get the discount.

I'm glad you took the low-quality product! As promised, the next product is indeed high-quality. Given the value you place on high-quality products, I think you'll love this one. It's worth $40000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better one elsewhere. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product for $10000. That's an amazing deal, and I'm glad I took the low-quality product in the first round to get this opportunity.
